## Code and Code Output - Tabs

::: panel-tabset
#### Outputs

```{r}
#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)

data(iris)

ggplot(data = iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, 
                        y = Petal.Length, 
                        color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  theme_classic()

```

#### Code

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false

library(tidyverse)

data(iris)

ggplot(data = iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, 
                        y = Petal.Length, 
                        color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  theme_classic()


```
:::

## Code and Code Output - codefold

<hr>

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| out-height: 7in
#| code-fold: true
#| fig-cap: "(a) Sepal and Petal length differ between species"

library(tidyverse)

data(iris)

ggplot(data = iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, 
                        y = Petal.Length, 
                        color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  theme_classic()
```

## Teaching Example-How to Make a `ggplot()` {.scrollable .smaller}

<hr>

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| out-height: 4.8in
#| code-line-numbers: "|11|12" 

library(tidyverse)

data(iris)

ggplot(data = iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, 
                        y = Petal.Length, 
                        color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  theme_classic() +
  xlab("Sepal Length") +
  ylab("Petal Length")
```
